name: the hobbit game (DavidCo_Branch1)
description:
use arrow keys to move and space to turn invisible

jump around and find the treasure to get more points you must turn invisible to get out of the pillar but you can only be invisible for a short period (see the bar in the top right when invisibility is about to run out) then go back to the pillar you have low acceleration but high top speed.

***recommended to play without sound your first session***

***recomended to have read the hobbit before playing***
